pages.text: The perilous $(item)Soul Alloy Pickaxe$() is worth more than your average, puny $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$(). $(thing)Right-clicking$() will coerce it to send out a beam which vein-mines any ores it touches. Applying the various $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$() onto a $(item)Soul Alloy Pickaxe$() will affect it in a plethora of ways:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the pace of mining with the pickaxe. Stacks with Efficiency.$()$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Increases the amount dropped by certain ores. Stacks with Fortune.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Quite literally increases the scope of mining. Increases by 1 block per gem.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability loss when using the tool. Stacks with Unbreaking.
